content: counts as first st work row 6 of chart a in appropriate size row 2 ws sl1 counts as first st work next row of chart a in appropriate size cont in est patt for a total of 30 36 row proceed to turn heel heel flap two row 1 rs sl1 counts as first st work row 6 of chart b in appropriate size row 2 ws sl1 counts as first st work next row of chart b in appropriate size cont in est patt for a total of 30 36 row proceed to turn heel turn heel row 1 rs sl1 k17 21 ssk k1 turn work row 2 ws sl 1 p7 9 p2tog p1 turn work row 3 rs sl 1 k8 10 ssk k1 turn work row 4 ws sl 1 p9 11 p2tog p1 turn work row 5 rs sl 1 k10 12 ssk k1 turn work row 6 ws sl 1 p11 13 p2tog p1 turn work row 7 rs sl 1 k12 14 ssk k1 turn work row 8 ws sl 1 p13 15 p2tog p1 turn work row 9 rs sl 1 k14 16 ssk k1 turn work row 10 ws sl 1 p15 17 p2tog p1 turn work size medium only row 11 rs sl 1 k16 ssk turn work row 12 ws sl 1 p16 p2tog turn work row 13 rs k18 proceed to gusset © 2010 star athena - all rights reserved 3 http //keeponknittinginthefreeworld blogspot com/ size large only row 11 rs sl1 k18 ssk k1 turn work row 12 ws sl1 p19 p2tog p1 turn work row 13 rs sl1 k20 ssk turn work row 14 ws sl1 p21 p2tog turn work row 15 rs k22 proceed to gusset gusset one set up round with n1 pick up and knit 15 18 sts along slip_stitch edge of heel flap pick up and knit 1 st in between heel flap and instep place marker with n2 work row 6 of chart b in appropriate size place marker pick up and knit 1 st in between instep and heel flap pick up and knit 15 18 sts along other slip_stitch edge of heel flap 80 96 sts n1 sole 34 41 sts n2 instep 46 55 sts note if you are using double pointed needles arrange the stitches to your liking round 1 k18 22 p13 16 k2tog p1 slm here and throughout work next row of chart b in appropriate size p1 ssk p13 16 round 2 and all even rounds k to 1 st before marker p1 work next row of chart b in appropriate size p1 k to end round 3 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog p1 work next row of chart b in appropriate size p1 ssk k to end repeat rnds 2-3 until 62 74 sts rem rearrange sts centering the charted sts on n2 as follows n1 sole 30 36 stockinette sts n2 instep 30 36 charted sts plus 1
